description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Play as Dougal McTaggart, an intrepid adventurer caught up in a magical world of cubes!  Place over 50 block types including TNT, Ladders, Water, Lava and Sheep!  Take in-game photos and show them off to your friends in the gallery, and let your imagination take over in this ultimate block-building game!
